Key Match Events: Nick Martinez pitched a complete game with a 1-0 loss
Pre-Game Insights: Nick Martinez's two-year, $26 million contract includes an opt-out clause after this season.
Post-Match Reflections: Freddie Benavides hopes Nick Martinez stays with the Reds for next season.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game was the fastest nine-inning Major League game since 2010.
The game featured a stiff wind blowing in at Wrigley Field, affecting the offense.
Others: Elly De La Cruz could have stopped at second base for the easy double but pressed for a triple and was thrown out.
